product_name: 180s Down Ear Warmers with Headphones - 2013 Overstock
long_description: The 180s Down Ear Warmers with Headphones let you listen your favorite tunes while keeping your ears warm with a water-resistant nylon shell, down insulation and faux shearling lining. Compatible with most handheld devices, including smartphones and MP3 players; headphones include microphone for hands-free conversation. Built-in stereo headphones have a detachable cord in case you don't need your tunes. 180s Down Ear Warmers with Headphones fit comfortably around the back of the head and over your ears; click-to-fit frame adjusts to fit various head sizes. Collapsible design provides convenient pocket-sized storage. Ear warmer styling allows wear with hats, helmets or glasses. Overstock.
short_description: The 180s Down Ear Warmers with Headphones let you listen your favorite tunes while keeping your ears warm with a water-resistant nylon shell, down insulation and faux shearling lining.
